name: Dead Quiet
description:
Please note that this game requires two gamepads to play!

'Dead Quiet' is a split-screen Player vs Player game that features visual and audio based tracking and tile-based procedural generated map, which places focus on consistent replay-ability. Players are encouraged to actively interact and observe each other for a rewarding competitive social experience.

As seen at PAX Australia 2019, this is a prototype of our game 'Dead Quiet' that we are releasing for free before we rebuild the game from scratch with a larger team and feedback from you!
